title: Which foundries have specimen books in PDF?
content:
I'm looking for complete font specimen books in PDF format. Especially from biggies like Adobe. Who's got em? I'm doing everything possible to lighten my luggage. ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804215139im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Jenni
author: anonymous
